name: Clumsy
effect: This trait bars you from using certain acrobatic abilities such as _Tumble_.

name: Earthguard
effect: While adjacent to an _Earthen_ _Obstacle_, increase this creature's _Guard_ by 1.

name: Earthwalk
effect: You may ignore _Earthen_ Terrain and move through _Earthen_ _Obstacles_ as if they were _Rough_ Terrain.

name: Nimble
effect: Once per _Round_, at the start of any _Phase_ you may _Move_ 2 [_Safe_].

name: Resistance
effect: This Trait will always specify a type of damage. If a creature has Resistance to a type of Damage, increase their _Guard_ by 3 against it.

name: Stable
effect: Reduce all _Forced Movement_ effects by X, where X is the listed Stable value.

name: Strong
effect: When you attack an _Obstacle_ with a _Weapon_ or _Martial Arts_ Attack, deal +1 Damage and you may treat any _Forced Movement_ as Damage, converting it at a 1 to 1 rate.

name: Swimmer
effect: Swimming does not cost this creature any additional _Movement_.

name: Aquatic
effect: This creature does not have Disadvantage on Attacks while Swimming and creatures do not have Advantage on Attacks against them.
